title: Notebook: Van der Poel Eyes MTB Worlds, Vos is Boss (Again), and Poga훾ar Keeps Crushing Souls
content:
Tour de Hoody: Rivals wary to follow Poga훾ar's wheel, Poole breaks through, Lefevere laments UAE's financial muscle, and tweaks to the '3km rule'.

Read the full article at Notebook: Van der Poel Eyes MTB Worlds, Vos is Boss (Again), and Poga훾ar Keeps Crushing Souls on Velo.
